settings.html: Monitors.com's Clinical Review Reading Station offers a comprehensive solution tailored to the needs of radiologists and medical imaging professionals. It combines cutting-edge technology with user-friendly design to streamline the radiology workflow and enhance diagnostic accuracy. Equipped with high-resolution LG 27" 8MP Color Clinical Review Displays, an HP ZBook Studio 16 G10 workstation, and a precision Dictation Mic, this station empowers radiologists to efficiently interpret medical images, make informed diagnoses, and communicate findings seamlessly.

settings.title: LG Factory DICOM Profile
settings.content: The LG 27M-W 27" 8MP IPS Color Clinical Review Medical Display Monitor is renowned for its precision calibration straight out of the box. Each unit undergoes meticulous calibration procedures at the LG factory, ensuring unparalleled image quality and accuracy. This rigorous process guarantees the production of the sharpest DICOM images available, meeting the stringent standards required for medical imaging applications. Moreover, users have the option to enhance and customize calibration further by purchasing a dedicated LUM calibration kit. This comprehensive kit enables on-demand calibration and compliance testing, allowing users to fine-tune the monitor's performance to their specific preferences and requirements. With these advanced calibration capabilities, the LG 27M-W ensures optimal image quality and precision tailored to meet the needs of healthcare professionals and enthusiasts alike.

settings.title: Dual Head Configuration
settings.content: The LG 27M-W monitor with its Dual Head Configuration is a versatile solution for those seeking enhanced productivity and seamless multitasking capabilities. Whether for work or play, this feature-rich monitor ensures you can efficiently manage multiple tasks without compromising on display quality or usability.

settings.title: Crystal-Clear 8MP Resolution on IPS Display
settings.content: When IPS meets 4K, the result is even more impressive. With LG factory DICOM calibrated display, The LG 27M-W’s Ultra HD Color IPS Clinical Review Medical Display Monitor offers much better color and greyscale reproduction than TN panels, providing incredible viewing angles and great color and DICOM greyscale consistency over the entire screen. With a 4K IPS monitor, users can enjoy seamless viewing. Furthermore, the 27M-W in 3840x2160 Ultra HD resolution provides increased clarity, sharper texture, details, more “real estate,” and smoother images.

settings.title: DICOM Compliance
settings.content: In order to guarantee the utmost precision and consistency in rendering shading for medical images, LG 27M-W employs a meticulous process wherein each grayscale tone is meticulously measured and calibrated during production. This rigorous calibration ensures that the monitor adheres to the stringent standards outlined in DICOM Part 14, thereby delivering unparalleled accuracy and reliability in medical imaging applications. By meticulously fine-tuning each aspect of grayscale rendering, LG 27M-W's commitment to excellence ensures that healthcare professionals can confidently rely on the fidelity and precision of their displays when interpreting critical medical images.

settings.title: On-Demand DICOM Calibration: LG + PerfectLUM
settings.content: The integration of PerfectLUM, an advanced sensor calibration solution, significantly enhances the LG 27M-W's functionality. PerfectLUM ensures consistent adherence to industry standards by meticulously adjusting the monitor's settings to maintain precise luminance and color uniformity. Its sophisticated technology effectively counters any gradual shifts over time, guaranteeing that medical professionals consistently perceive images accurately without any discrepancies. This meticulous calibration process not only upholds the integrity of the displayed images but also instills confidence in healthcare providers, enabling them to make critical decisions confidently. With PerfectLUM in place, the LG 27M-W becomes a reliable tool for medical professionals, ensuring the accuracy and reliability of visual data for diagnosis and treatment planning.

settings.title: Features at a Glance
settings.content:
Experience enhanced medical imaging with the LG 27M-W 8MP IPS Color Clinical Review Medical Display Monitor, designed to meet professional standards:

  • IPS Technology: Accurate image reproduction and consistent colors.
  • DICOM Calibration: Precise grayscale representation.
  • Versatile Connectivity: HDMI, DisplayPort, and USB Type-C inputs.
  • High-Resolution Display: 3840 x 2160 resolution.
  • Contrast and Brightness: 1000:1 contrast ratio, 350 cd/m² brightness.
  • Wide Viewing Angles: 178°/178° viewing angles.
  • Swift Response Time: 5 ms GtG response time.
  • Vibrant Color Reproduction: 1.07 billion colors.
  • Convenient Connectivity: Built-in USB 3.0 hub.

The LG 27M-W offers reliable performance and essential features for medical imaging professionals.

settings.title: Unifying Workspaces: The All-in-One Power of USB-C Connectivity
settings.content: The LG 27M-W 27" 8MP Color Clinical Review Medical Display integrates seamlessly into this vision of workspace transformation. With its advanced features and capabilities, including USB-C ports, it enhances efficiency and productivity in medical environments. Connecting the LG 27M-W via a single USB-C cable not only facilitates the transfer of 4K screen display and data but also provides power to charge laptop or mobile device batteries simultaneously. This means that healthcare professionals can streamline their workspace by eliminating the clutter of multiple cables and power sources, creating a more organized and efficient environment for clinical review and analysis. With the LG 27M-W, the ordinary workroom transcends into an advanced studio, optimizing workflow and enhancing the quality of medical imaging tasks.

settings.title: Experience Ergonomic Flexibility with Solid Alloy Stand
settings.content: Exemplifying the perfect synergy of size, weight, functionality, and convenience, the LG 27M-W 27" 8MP Monitor stands out in the realm of clinical review medical displays. It measures 534mm (21 inches) in height, 614.7 mm (24.2 inches) in width, and 223.5 mm (8.8 inches) in depth per monitor, offering a generous viewing area for detailed radiological examinations. With a weight of 6.2 kg (13.7 lbs) including the stand and 4.7kg (10.4 lbs) without it per monitor, the LG 27M-W is a sturdy and durable display that assures longevity. Applicable in diverse settings, from hospitals to home offices, the LG 27M-W is an exceptional choice for radiologists seeking the ideal mix of size, performance, and image quality in a color clinical review medical display.

settings.title: HP ZBook Studio 16 G10: Advanced Mobile Radiology Workstation
settings.content:
• HP ZBook Studio 16 G10 Mobile Radiology Workstation designed for radiologists, offering high performance and precision.
  • DICOM Calibration display ensures high image quality, rendering medical scans with accuracy and detail.
  • WUXGA screen provides clear visualization of images for confident diagnostic decisions.
  • Intel Core i7-13800H processor for fast performance with medical imaging software.
  • 64GB memory enables smooth multitasking even with resource-intensive applications.
  • 512GB NVMe SSD offers ample storage for medical datasets and patient records.
  • Intel Iris Xe 4GB graphics card supports 3D medical image rendering and DICOM sequences.
  • Durable MIL-STD-810H certified construction withstands shocks, vibrations, and extreme temperatures.

settings.title: PerfectLUM
settings.content: PerfectLum is specifically designed to optimize the HP ZBook Studio 16 G9’s display, ensuring compliance with medical imaging standards such as DICOM for grayscale accuracy. Its calibration capabilities extend to maintaining the 100% DCI-P3 color gamut offered by the HP ZBook Studio 16 G9, essential for precise radiological diagnostics.

settings.title: HP ZBook Studio 16 G9's Ports
settings.content:
With Thunderbolt™ 4 and USB4™ Type-C® connectivity, the HP ZBook Studio 16 G9 offers versatile linking options to various medical imaging equipment, enhancing its utility in diverse medical settings.

01. Power CHarging Indicatior
02. Power Connector
03. (2) Thunderbolt 4 with USB4 Type-C

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.content: The workstation's sleek design, measuring just 0.76 inches in thickness and weighing only 3.81 lbs, makes it highly portable for healthcare professionals on the move.

settings.title: Nuance PowerMic II: Enhanced Physician Productivity
settings.content:
The PowerMic II by Nuance is designed to enhance physician productivity through intuitive control of dictation and speech recognition functions. Its ergonomic design facilitates easy operation for dictating, navigating, reviewing, and editing documentation.

Enhanced Functionality:

The PowerMic II improves PC dictation by simplifying voice recording, navigating on-screen templates and reports, and editing recognized text. It integrates PC mouse capabilities, reducing the need to switch between devices and enhancing workflow efficiency.

User-Friendly Features:

Physicians benefit from rapid navigation through report templates and the ability to insert recognized text using voice commands. The microphone's ergonomic design combined with PC mouse functions ensures ease of use and increased productivity.

Key Features:

  • USB Connectivity: Allows easy plug-and-play installation on PCs, eliminating the requirement for sound card-enabled systems.
  • Integrated Barcode Scanner: Includes a barcode scanner for inputting MRN, accession numbers, or other barcode-driven data, with audible feedback for confirmation.
  • Unidirectional Microphone with Noise Cancellation: Provides accurate dictation even in noisy environments, enhancing reliability.

settings.title: Support and Warranty
settings.content:
This complete package includes remote technical support and installation assistance, ensuring a smooth setup process. Our skilled technical support manager will guide you through the connection process upon delivery.

Benefit from a comprehensive 3-year full technical support and warranty covering parts and labor. Additionally, our 30-day satisfaction money-back guarantee ensures your complete peace of mind. All necessary user guides, instructions, and MQSA Guidelines are provided for convenience.

Choose our HP Zbook Studio 16 G10 Complete general radiology reading station for a streamlined, efficient, and comfortable diagnostic experience.

settings.title: What's Included
settings.html:
• 2 x LG 27" 8MP Color Clinical Review Medical Display Monitor
  • 1 x HP ZBook Studio 16 G10 Mobile Radiology Workstation | 16" WUXGA DICOM Calibrated | Core i7-13700H @ 5.0GHz | 64GB DDR5 | 512GB NVMe SSD | Intel Iris Xe 4GB | Win10-11 Pro
  • 1 x Nuance PowerMic II Dictation Microphone 9ft (0POWM2N)
